name: Apodrakosis Ascension Gate of Wyrmhaze
desc:
You can only control 1 "Apodrakosis Ascension Gate of Wyrmhaze". Any monster sent from the field to the GY during your opponent's turn is banished instead. "Apodrakosis" Pendulum Monsters, and Level 10 or higher monsters whose original Type is Wyrm, you control gain this effect.
● Once per opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can place 1 face-up "Apodrakosis" Continuous Spell you control on the bottom of the Deck, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; change its ATK to 0.
